data.why:
Tk::LoginDialog.pm - derived from Tk::EntryDialog.pm, a pop-up
    dialog box with two labels and entries for name and password (with
    -show "*" on the latter), two buttons for Login and Cancel; returns
    name and (plaintext) password. Currently, the accepted options are
    the text in the Toplevel title, both labels, and the Login button,
    and a -font spec used in the labels.

    Enhancements being considered are encrpyption of the password and
    additional display options.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (KESZLER; Scott R. Keszler)
